name: Purdie Rogers
overview:
Founded in 1990, Purdie Rogers is a digital marketing agency for product manufacturers of building products and home products. Our understanding of this market is all encompassing, and we assist our clients with a full range of digital and traditional services.

Vertical Industry Marketing Experts For over twenty years, we’ve helped building products and home products manufacturers exceed their marketing expectations by delivering strategy that’s right-on and creative that’s fresh, relevant and gets measurable results.

Digital and Traditional Integration Since 1996, Purdie Rogers has integrated digital and traditional marketing programs aimed at the building industryâ€™s multiple target audiences: one-step and two-step distributors, retailers, showrooms, builders, remodelers, developers, specifiers, influencers, code officials, architects, designers and homeowners.
